channel.title: Posts on baguettebyte's coding!
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on baguettebyte's coding!

item.title: HTML and CSS
item.description: We shall dissect and unravel the mysteries of these fine entities, HTML and CSS. What are they? What can they do for us? Why have they arrived? and have they come in peace, or do they come bearing some hidden agenda? So fasten your cravat and steady your monocle, for the journey ahead may prove delightfully turbulent!

item.title: Visual Studio Code And Command Line Basics
item.description:
A Gentleman’s Introduction to Visual Studio Code and the Command Line: Mastering the Tools of the Trade.

So, today’s learning curve brings us face-to-face with the enigmatic realm of IDEs… or is it IDE’s? No, no, let us avoid that grammatical minefield and simply stick to the singular: IDE. I won’t lie, I have dabbled in Visual Studio Code, or VSC, as the fashionable youth call it, mostly to wrangle this very blog into submission. It was a harrowing ordeal, given my complete lack of expertise, but I persevered! Of course, I leaned heavily on the wisdom of the theme’s discussion board and scoured Hugo’s official site for guidance. A humbling experience, to be sure.

item.title: Taking the First Step: Part 2
item.description:
Beginner’s Guide to the Internet, Web Pages, and Networking: 2

The Continuation from Part 1 – Brace Yourselves!

What is a client?

A client, is none other than your trusty computer! The very machine you are using at this moment is connected to your Wi-Fi, which, in turn, is connected to the great expanse of the internet. But let us not forget, software can be clients too! Your web browser, for instance, is a client, politely requesting information from servers so that you may peruse the wonders of the web.

item.title: Taking the first Step: Part 1
item.description:
Beginner’s Guide to the Internet, Web Pages, and Networking: 1

First things first! We shall dive headlong into the vast and mysterious world of the INTERNET. You might gasp in astonishment, “But surely, we already know it all, right?” To which I shall reply, with all due respect, “Absolutely not!” Brace yourselves, my dear friends!

As so graciously explained in this video (oh, how delightful!), the internet is, wait for it, a cable! Yes, I hear your cries of disbelief! “A cable?!” you exclaim, to which I say, “Indeed, let us dig a hole, metaphorically speaking, and uncover the hidden wonders of this humble wire!”

item.title: Welcome!
item.description:
My Launchpad: A Journey from Beginner to Master!

Well, hello there, dear reader! If you’ve stumbled upon this humble corner of the internet, you’re in for an exciting ride, because we’re about to dive into the world of coding together. Now, let me be clear: I’m not a seasoned expert (yet!). I’m starting this journey from scratch, and I’m inviting you to join me as I learn, stumble, and hopefully grow into a coding master along the way.
